nodes.bodyText: That's where we tell the compiler to only generate a subset of input objects
same for fragments (all fragments are still needed as input to validate arguments, type conditions, etc...)
The IR is made serializable (to save the Fragment in the metadata). The serialization is only done if generateMetadata is true so as not to slow down compilation in the general case.

This method decides what types to generate/not generate. The rest of this file is mainly code copied from GraphQLDocumentParser. GraphQLDocumentParser is now only responsible for parsing and IRBuilder does more global operation such as determining the types to generate and including the fragments sources.

+    }.map { it.name }
+        .toSet()
+  }

+  fun build(documentParseResult: DocumentParseResult): CodeGenerationIR {
